attributes.action: Enable the targeted community of African Caribbean People to have an Art Gallery to display their visual Arts available nationally to all cultures to view
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition would enable such people to have a stake in the cultural industries of the UK and therefore create employment, revenue and tourism. It would provide pride for an otherwise overtaxed underpayed under represented sector of society.
As proposed by Clive R. R. Anderson of the Ralston Roy Art Foundation
